attributes.action: We call upon The Scottish Government to vote to block the UK from leaving EU.
attributes.background: Scotland voted to stay in the EU and we feel that our leaving the EU would be a bad decision for the nation as a whole.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
